dt2.1:1.1_0: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:1.2_0: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:1.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:2.1_0: Vedanākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:2.2_0: Vedanākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:2.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:3.1_0: Saññākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:3.2_0: Saññākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:3.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:4.1_0: Saṅkhārakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:4.2_0: Saṅkhārakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:4.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:5.1_0: Viññāṇakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:5.2_0: Viññāṇakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:5.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:7.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:7.2_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:7.4_0: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:8.2_0: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:8.4_0: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:9.2_0: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:9.4_0: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:10.2_0: dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:10.4_0: Tīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:12.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:12.2_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:12.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:13.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:13.2_0: tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:13.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:14.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:14.2_0: tīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:14.4_0: Dvīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:16.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:16.2_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:16.4_0: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:17.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:17.2_0: catūhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:17.4_0: Ekena khandhena, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:19.1_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:19.2_0: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:19.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:20.1_0: Pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:20.2_0: Pañcakkhandhā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:20.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:22.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ?
dt2.1:22.2_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:22.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:23.3_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:23.5_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:24.1_0: Manāyatanaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:24.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:25.1_0: Dhammāyatanaṁ asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:25.3_0: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:27.1_0: Cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:27.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:28.1_7: cakkhāyatanañca phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:28.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:29.1_0: Cakkhāyatanañca manāyatanañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:29.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:30.1_0: Cakkhāyatanañca dhammāyatanañca asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:30.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:32.1_0: Dvādasāyatanāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:32.2_0: Dvādasāyatanāni asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:32.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.1_0: Cakkhudhātu katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:34.2_0: Cakkhudhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.1_15: manoviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:36.1_0: Dhammadhātu asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:36.3_0: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:38.1_0: Cakkhudhātu ca sotadhātu ca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:38.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:39.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:40.1_0: Cakkhudhātu ca cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:40.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:41.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:42.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:44.1_0: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:44.2_0: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:44.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:46.1_0: Dukkhasaccaṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ?
dt2.1:46.2_0: Dukkhasaccaṁ pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:46.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.

dt2.1:48.1_0: Nirodhasaccaṁ na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.

dt2.1:57.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:58.1_0: Cattāri saccāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?
dt2.1:58.2_0: Cattāri saccāni asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:58.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.

dt2.1:60.2_0: Cakkhundriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:60.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.

dt2.1:61.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:62.1_0: Manindriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.

dt2.1:63.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.

dt2.1:72.1_0: Bāvīsatindriyāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?
dt2.1:72.2_0: Bāvīsatindriyāni catūhi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:72.4_0: Ekena khandhena pañcahāyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:73.1_0: Avijjā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:73.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:74.1_0: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:74.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:75.1_0: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:75.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:76.1_0: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:76.3_0: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:77.1_0: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:77.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:78.1_4: kammabhavo ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:78.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:79.1_3: pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:81.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:152.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:153.1_1: cittavisaṁsaṭṭhā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:153.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:154.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:154.3_0: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:155.1_2: no cittānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:155.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:156.1_1: cittānuparivattino dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:156.3_0: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:157.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:157.3_0: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:158.1_2: no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:158.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:159.1_0: Ajjhattikā dhammā dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:159.3_0: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:160.1_0: Bāhirā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:160.3_0: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:161.1_0: Upādā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:161.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:162.1_0: No upādā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:162.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:163.1_0: Upādinnā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:163.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:164.1_0: Anupādinnā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:164.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:165.1_4: kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:165.3_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:166.1_2: kilesavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:166.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:167.1_1: saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā …
dt2.1:167.1_2: kilesavippayuttā saṅkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:167.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:168.1_1: kilesavippayuttā asaṅkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:168.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:169.1_2: saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā …
dt2.1:169.1_3: kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:169.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:170.1_3: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:170.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:171.1_3: na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:171.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:172.1_0: Savitakkā dhammā … savicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:172.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:173.1_1: avicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:173.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:174.1_0: Sappītikā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:174.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:175.1_2: na sukhasahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:175.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:176.1_0: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:176.3_0: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:177.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:177.3_0: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:178.1_0: Na upekkhāsahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:178.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:179.1_2: sauttarā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:179.3_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:180.1_2: anuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:180.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:181.1_4: saraṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:181.3_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:182.1_4: araṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:182.2_0: Araṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:182.4_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
